messages.message:
:alarm: <!here> Sorry to spam - but sorta urgent with CI being _..._ erm... _dishonest_, right now.... :sweat_smile:

Here (https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/d/aelo4zivfuxhce/pre-merge-quick-view-dev?var-pr_num=71024&var-job_num=5&var-trace_id=887c23a7ba18b49faffb6fcad19e6458&orgId=1) is a quick dashboard view that you *will need to use for now* to see if your CI job actually passed or not - specifically the *top-right panel* which filters for and highlights error and/or failure messages.

The "result" field will say "Success" or similar, no matter what might have failed during the run, but *if there are errors/failures shown in the top-right panel, you need to count the run as FAILED.*

I'm digging into this urgently right now, but wanted to give an unblocker of sorts while I try to find the issue.

(Reverting the PR is an option but it's a very painful one (I did the silly thing of merging a giant PR... but also sorta couldn't avoid it :lolcry:). If I can't get it figured before i log off for the day I'll work out a revert and go that way)
